trans-unit.source:
You are about to upgrade your website to a more recent version of the application. Applying upgrades on a consistent basis is the best way to ensure that you are protecting the integrity of your investment and the security of your users and assets. Before proceeding with the automated upgrade process please ensure that:
  • you have made plans to first attempt this process in a staging environment
  • you have documented your current installation characteristics including doing research on the compatibility of any third party modules which you may be using
  • you have created the necessary backups of your environment so that you will be able to restore your website in the event of an unexpected upgrade failure.
trans-unit.target:
You are about to upgrade your website to a more recent version of the application. Applying upgrades on a consistent basis is the best way to ensure that you are protecting the integrity of your investment and the security of your users and assets. Before proceeding with the automated upgrade process please ensure that:
  • you have made plans to first attempt this process in a staging environment
  • you have documented your current installation characteristics including doing research on the compatibility of any third party modules which you may be using
  • you have created the necessary backups of your environment so that you will be able to restore your website in the event of an unexpected upgrade failure.

trans-unit.source: Database and application versions match - there is no upgrade to apply.
trans-unit.target: Database and application versions match - there is no upgrade to apply.

trans-unit.source: Database and application versions match - there is an incremental release you can upgrade to.
trans-unit.target: Database and application versions match - there is an incremental release you can upgrade to.

trans-unit.source:
Welcome to the DotNetNuke Upgrade Page.

The first step is to choose the language you want to use for the upgrade.

trans-unit.source: The product improvement program allows us to better understand how we can improve DNN for you. The data will help us analyze usage and what is important for people using the product. All of the data is anonymous and for internal use only. Learn more about the Product Improvement Program.
trans-unit.target: The product improvement program allows us to better understand how we can improve DNN for you.
